footer.description: Your platform for digital income from content creation and education.
footer.address: Georgia, Tbilisi, Leo and Nodar Gabuniya II Lane, No. 3, Apt. 27

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: Wavleba - Your Income Platform from Digital Content
aboutUs.introText: Wavleba was created with one main idea: knowledge sharing and content creation should be a source of income for everyone. We combine learning, content creation, and monetization on one platform where users can learn from lecturers, create video clips, and earn money from their own creations.
aboutUs.missionText: Our mission is to create an ecosystem where everyone can earn income from their skills and creativity. Whether you want to learn new skills, create your own content, or share professional lecturer courses - Wavleba is one platform for all opportunities.
aboutUs.forUsers1: Unified space: learning, content creation, and earning on one platform, in just a few clicks.
aboutUs.forUsers2: Quality educational courses: from professional lecturers in various directions.
aboutUs.forUsers3: Monetization opportunity: earn income from your created clips.
aboutUs.forUsers5: Security: protected payments and reliable financial operations.
aboutUs.forLecturers1: Attract new audiences: the platform increases visibility and expands the student base.
aboutUs.forLecturers2: Additional income: earn income from clip views.
aboutUs.forLecturers3: Efficient management: quick course uploads and control.
aboutUs.forLecturers4: Marketing support: promotions, campaigns, and direct communication with students.
aboutUs.forLecturers5: Reliability: transparent terms and secure settlements.
aboutUs.howItWorks1: Learn: choose your desired course and learn from professionals.
aboutUs.howItWorks2: Create: cut out the best moments, create useful clips.
aboutUs.howItWorks3: Publish: upload your clips to the platform.
aboutUs.howItWorks4: Earn: receive income from every view.
aboutUs.whyWavleba1: Because we combine learning and earning on one platform.
aboutUs.whyWavleba2: Because we care about both student development and lecturer success.
aboutUs.whyWavleba3: Because our goal is to give everyone the opportunity to earn money from their own creativity.
aboutUs.visionText: Today Wavleba offers users educational courses and the opportunity to create clips, but this is just the beginning. We plan to expand the platform in various directions - podcasts, live streams, masterclasses, workshops, and much more. We believe that Wavleba will soon become a platform where everyone can learn, create, and earn - don't think, create and earn!

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.section1Text: This document represents the terms of use for the Wavleba platform ("platform", "company") and regulates the legal relationship between the user ("user") and the company. The platform is an online intermediary service that connects users with lecturers for knowledge sharing.
terms.section2Text: By registering, accessing, or using the platform, you agree to these terms and additional policies (privacy policy, content rules, etc.). If you disagree, please do not use the platform.
terms.section3Item1: Provide correct information (name, contact, payment details) and keep it updated.
terms.section3Item2: Use the platform legally and in compliance with facility rules.
terms.section3Item3: Refrain from platform violations, system manipulation, or fraud.
terms.section3Item4: Respect the rights of other users and partners.
terms.section4Item1: A valid email or phone is required to create an account.
terms.section4Item2: Password security is the user's responsibility.
terms.section4Item3: In case of violation, the company has the right to temporarily suspend or cancel the account.
terms.section5Text: Personal data processing is done in accordance with Georgian legislation and the company's privacy policy. Data is used only for booking purposes. Users have the following rights: access, correction, deletion ("right to be forgotten"), restriction, portability, and objection. In case of data breach, users will be notified within the legally prescribed period.
terms.section6Text1: Payment model: Payment made by the user on the platform is considered received by the partner at the moment when the company or its payment provider receives the funds. The company acts as the partner's "limited payment collection agent".
terms.section6Text2: Authorization and charging: When submitting a booking request, only fund sufficiency is verified (authorization). Actual charging occurs only after the administration confirms the transaction.
terms.section6Text3: Prices: The price shown to the user includes everything (taxes, fees). No additional charges will be made.
terms.section6Text4: Compensation: After completing a confirmed transaction, the partner will receive funds on the 5th (fifth) day of each month.
terms.section7Text: Prohibited: fake transactions, unauthorized use of third-party data, uploading malicious content, using bots, reverse engineering of platform code, and using hate speech.
terms.section8Text: Wavleba's brand, code, logo, and materials are the company's property. Photos and descriptions uploaded by partners remain their property, although the platform has the right to use them for service display purposes. Reviews, comments, and photos uploaded by users remain their property, although the user grants the platform a free license for their display and use for platform functionality.
terms.section9Item1: The platform is provided on an "as is" basis.
terms.section9Item2: The lecturer is responsible for service quality.
terms.section9Item3: The company is not liable for direct or indirect damages caused to the user, except when caused by the company's gross negligence or intentional action.
terms.section10Text: The company may terminate or suspend an account in case of violation, fraud, or security risk. The user may delete their account at any time; data retention occurs for the period specified by law.
terms.section11Text: The company may update the terms. Users will be notified in advance of changes. Continued use of the platform means agreement to updated terms. If any provision of the terms is deemed invalid, the rest remains in effect. This document and the policies it references constitute the entire agreement between the parties.
terms.section12Text: The terms are governed by Georgian legislation. Disputes will be heard in Tbilisi courts. Before going to court, the user must contact platform support and try to resolve the dispute through mediation. Only after unsuccessful attempts may one go to court.
terms.contactInfo:
Wavleba
Address: Georgia, Tbilisi, Leo and Nodar Gabuniya II Lane, No. 3, Apt. 27
Email: bejisscience@gmail.com
Phone: +995 555 54 99 88

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Text: This privacy policy ("policy") explains how Wavleba collects, processes, and protects users' personal data. The policy is regulated in accordance with Georgia's Personal Data Protection Law and EU GDPR principles.
privacy.section2Text:
The data controller is: Wavleba
Address: Georgia, Tbilisi, Leo and Nodar Gabuniya II Lane, No. 3, Apt. 27
Email: bejisscience@gmail.com
Phone: +995 555 54 99 88
privacy.section3Item2: Payment data: card details (processed by a secure payment provider, the company does not store card numbers).
privacy.section3Item3: Technical data: IP address, device type, cookies, logs.
privacy.section3Item4: Content: reviews, ratings, and uploaded photos.
privacy.section3Item5: Location data (new): precise GPS data only with your consent; approximate location at IP/city level for platform functionality and security.
privacy.section4Item4: Platform improvement and technical security assurance.
privacy.section4Item5: Advertising and marketing communication (only with user consent).
privacy.section5Item2: With payment providers (e.g., Bank of Georgia iPay).
privacy.section5Item3: With service providers (hosting, analytics, technical support).
privacy.section5Item4: With law enforcement only in cases provided by law.
privacy.section6Text: After deleting a user account, data is retained only for the period required by law (e.g., for accounting purposes). Other data is deleted or anonymized within a reasonable period.
privacy.section7Text: Data is stored on secure Supabase/PostgreSQL servers. Encryption (in transit & at rest), access control, and regular monitoring are used. Only authorized personnel have access to personal data.
privacy.section8Item5: Restrict or object to data processing.
privacy.section8Item6: Cancel consent to marketing communication at any time.
privacy.section9Text: Wavleba uses cookies and analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics) to improve service. Users can manage cookie settings from their own browser.
privacy.section10Text: If data is transferred outside Georgia, the company ensures appropriate protection (standard contractual clauses or adequacy decision).
privacy.section11Text: The company is authorized to update the privacy policy. Users will be notified in advance of changes. The updated policy will take effect immediately upon publication.
privacy.contactInfo: For any request regarding personal data processing, please contact: bejisscience@gmail.com

personalSecurity.title: Personal Information Security Policy
personalSecurity.section1Text: Wavleba places the utmost importance on protecting users' personal information. This policy defines the standards and rules by which the company protects personal data security.
personalSecurity.section2Item1: Registration data (name, email, phone, bank details);
personalSecurity.section2Item2: Payment information (processed by a trusted provider);
personalSecurity.section2Item3: Technical data (IP address, device type, cookies);
personalSecurity.section3Item1: Legal compliance: all data is processed in accordance with Georgian legislation and GDPR principles.
personalSecurity.section3Item2: Minimization: we collect only the data necessary for service provision.
personalSecurity.section3Item3: Transparency: the user always has information about what data is stored and for what purpose.
personalSecurity.section3Item4: Security: we use technical and organizational measures to protect data.
personalSecurity.section3Item5: Responsibility: only authorized personnel have access to personal data.
personalSecurity.section4Item1: Data protection through encryption (both in storage and transmission).
personalSecurity.section4Item4: Creating backup copies to prevent data loss.
personalSecurity.section4Item5: Continuous updates for compliance with security standards.
personalSecurity.section5Item3: Request data deletion ("right to be forgotten");
personalSecurity.section5Item4: Restrict or object to data processing;
personalSecurity.section5Item5: Refuse marketing communication at any time.
personalSecurity.section6Item1: Users will receive notification no later than 24 hours;
personalSecurity.section6Item2: The company will take all necessary measures to stop the problem and reduce damage;
personalSecurity.section6Item3: If necessary, information will be provided to relevant regulatory authorities.
personalSecurity.contactInfo:
If you have questions or want more information about personal data protection, contact us:

Wavleba
Address: Georgia, Tbilisi, Leo and Nodar Gabuniya II Lane, No. 3, Apt. 27
Email: bejisscience@gmail.com
Phone: +995 555 54 99 88

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.section1Text: The refund policy defines the conditions under which Wavleba provides refunds to users for paid amounts.
refund.section2Text: The amount is fully refunded if the service could not be provided due to technical failure, force majeure, or unacceptable actions by the company/partner.
refund.section3Item1: Refund requests must be sent to email: bejisscience@gmail.com
refund.section3Item2: The request must include: user name, email, and payment confirmation.
refund.section3Item3: The company is obligated to verify the information and refund the amount no later than 10 business days from processing the request.
refund.contactInfo:
Wavleba
Address: Georgia, Tbilisi, Leo and Nodar Gabuniya II Lane, No. 3, Apt. 27
Email: bejisscience@gmail.com
Phone: +995 555 54 99 88
